description: Alchemical control over acid.
name: acid alchemy

talents.info_text:
When you throw your alchemist bombs, you infuse them with explosive acid that can blind.

In addition all acid damage you do is increased by 5%, 12%, 18%, 22%, 26%.

You cannot have more than one alchemist infusion sustain active at once.
talents.name: Acid Infusion

talents.info_text:
While Acid Infusion is active, your bombs coat your golem in acid for 7, 9, 10, 12, 13 turns when they hit it.

While coated, any melee hit against your golem has a 39%, 51%, 59%, 64%, 69% chance to trigger a radius 4 cone of acid towards the attacker that does 0.0 Acid damage to all caught inside. (This can only happen once per turn.)

The effects increase with your talent level and with the Spellpower and damage modifiers of your golem.
talents.name: Caustic Golem

talents.info_text:
A radius 3 pool of acid spawns at the target location, doing 36, 49, 58, 67, 74 Acid damage each turn for 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

All creatures caught in the mire will also suffer a 11%, 21%, 30%, 36%, 42% slowness effect.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Caustic Mire

talents.info_text:
Acid erupts all around your target, dealing 205, 277, 333, 380, 422 acid damage.

The acid attack is extremely distracting, and may remove up to 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 physical or mental temporary effects or mental sustains (depending on the Spell Save of the target).

The damage and chance to remove effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Dissolving Acid

description: Create and empower powerful undead minions.
name: advanced necrotic minions

talents.info_text:
Minions are only tools. You may dispose of them… Violently.

Makes the targeted minion explode for 35%, 42%, 46%, 49%, 51% of its maximum life in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 as blight damage.

Beware! Don't get caught in the blast! (unless you know Dark Empthy: 0% chance to ignore damage)
talents.name: Undead Explosion

talents.info_text:
Combines 3 of your minions into a bone giant.

At level 1, it makes a bone giant.

At level 3, it makes a heavy bone giant.

At level 5, it makes an eternal bone giant.

At level 6, it has a 20% chance to produce a runed bone giant.

Only one bone giant can be active at any time.
talents.name: Assemble

talents.info_text:
Sacrifice a bone giant minion. Using its bones, you make a temporary shield around you that prevents any attacks from doing more than 22%, 19%, 18%, 17%, 16% of your total life.

The effect lasts 15, 19, 22, 25, 27 turns.
talents.name: Sacrifice

talents.info_text:
Each minion you summon has a chance to be a more advanced form of undead. Your chance for each type of minion is as follows:

Degenerated skeleton warrior: 50%, 32%, 19%, 10%, 2%

Skeleton warrior: 9%, 12%, 13%, 15%, 17%

Armoured skeleton warrior: 0%, 3%, 5%, 7%, 10%

Skeleton archer: 10%, 15%, 16%, 14%, 10%

Skeleton master archer: 0%, 2%, 3%, 5%, 6%

Skeleton mage: 4%, 6%, 8%, 9%, 10%

Ghoul: 18%, 14%, 10%, 7%, 4%

Ghast: 0%, 2%, 4%, 5%, 6%

Ghoulking: 0%, 0%, 2%, 4%, 6%

Vampire: 5%, 6%, 6%, 6%, 4%

Master vampire: 0%, 1%, 2%, 2%, 3%

Grave wight: 0%, 0%, 1%, 2%, 3%

Barrow wight: 0%, 0%, 0%, 1%, 3%

Dread: 0%, 1%, 3%, 4%, 5%

Lich: 0%, 0%, 0%, 1%, 3%
talents.name: Minion Mastery

description: Advanced golem operations.
name: advanced-golemancy

talents.info_text: You tap into your golem's life energies to replenish your own. Drains 362, 464, 544, 611, 670 life.
talents.name: Life Tap
require: Level 10, Mag 22; Having an Alchemist Golem
Level 11, Mag 24; Having an Alchemist Golem
Level 12, Mag 26; Having an Alchemist Golem
Level 13, Mag 28; Having an Alchemist Golem
Level 14, Mag 30; Having an Alchemist Golem

talents.info_text:
Insert a pair of gems into your golem, providing it with the gem bonuses and changing its melee attack damage type. You may remove the gems and insert different ones; this does not destroy the gems you remove.

Gem level usable: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5

Gem changing is done in the golem's inventory.
talents.name: Gem Golem

talents.info_text:
You activate a special mode of your golem, boosting its regeneration rate by 50, 65, 76, 86, 94 life per turn for 7 turns.

If your golem was dead, it is instantly brought back to life with 28%, 38%, 46%, 52%, 57% life.

While supercharged, your golem is enraged and deals 25% more damage.
talents.name: Supercharge Golem

talents.info_text:
Increases your golem's life, mana and stamina regeneration rates by 1.00, 2.00, 3.00, 4.00, 5.00.

At level 1, 3 and 5, the golem also gains a new rune slot.

Even without this talent, Golems start with three rune slots.
talents.name: Runic Golem

description: Command the arcane forces into healing and protection.
name: aegis

talents.info_text:
Imbues your body with arcane forces, reconstructing it to a default state, healing for 379, 498, 591, 669, 738 life.

The life healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Arcane Reconstruction

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with strengthening arcane forces.

Every damage shield, time shield, displacement shield, and disruption shield affecting you has its power increased by 45%, 54%, 61%, 67%, 73%.

At level 5, it also increases the duration of all shields by 1 turn.

The shield value will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shielding

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with protective arcane forces.

Each time you receive a direct heal (not a life regeneration effect), you automatically gain a damage shield equal to 53%, 59%, 63%, 66%, 68% of the heal value for 3 turns.

This will replace an existing damage shield if the new shield value and duration would be greater than or equal to the old.

The shield value will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Arcane Shield

talents.info_text:
Release arcane energies into most magical shields currently protecting you.

It will affect at most 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 shield effects.

Damage Shield, Time Shield, Displacement Shield: Increase the damage absorption value by 72%, 84%, 92%, 100%, 107%.

Disruption Shield: Tap into the stored energies to restore the shield (at a rate of 2 energy per 1 shield power). Any leftover energy is converted back into mana at a rate of 2.29, 1.93, 1.72, 1.57, 1.46 energy per mana.

The charging will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Aegis

description: Tap on the core arcane forces of the aether, unleashing devastating effects on your foes.
name: aether

talents.info_text:
You focus the aether into a spinning beam of arcane energies, doing 93, 126, 151, 173, 192 arcane damage and having 25% chance to silence the creatures it pierces.

The beam will also damage its epicenter each turn for 10% of the damage (but it will not silence).

The beam spins with incredible speed (1600%) and can only hit the same target up to 3 times inbetween their turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Aether Beam

talents.info_text:
Rupture reality to temporarily open a passage to the aether, triggering 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 random arcane explosions in the target area.

Each explosion does 113, 152, 183, 209, 232 arcane damage in radius 2, and will each trigger at one turn intervals.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Aether Breach

talents.info_text:
Infuse your body with untethered aether forces for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

While active, the cooldown for Arcane and Aether spells is divided by 3, your arcane damage and penetration is increased by 25%, your Disruption Shield radius is increased to 10, and your maximum mana is increased by 33%.

Using non arcane based spells in this state is hard and makes you lose 50 mana each time (up to once per turn).

Spells considered arcane for the purpose of not-losing mana are:
talents.name: Aether Avatar

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with Pure Aether, increasing all your arcane damage by 2.8%, 5.4%, 7.5%, 9.2%, 11% and ignoring 17%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% arcane resistance of your targets.

At level 5 casting Aether Avatar removes up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 4 magical or physical detrimental effects.
talents.name: Pure Aether

description: Harness the power of the air to fry your foes.
name: air

talents.info_text:
Conjures up mana into a powerful beam of lightning, doing 75, 101, 122, 139, 154 to 225, 304, 365, 417, 463 damage (150, 203, 243, 278, 308 average)

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Lightning

talents.info_text:
Invokes a forking beam of lightning doing 71, 95, 114, 131, 145 to 212, 286, 343, 392, 435 damage (141, 191, 229, 261, 290 average) and forking to another target.

It can hit up to 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 targets up to 10 grids apart, and will never hit the same one twice; nor will it hit the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chain Lightning

talents.info_text:
A gentle wind circles around the caster, increasing carrying capacity by 67, 91, 109, 125, 138, defense against projectiles by 17, 23, 28, 32, 35, pin immunity by 13%, 41%, 62%, 81%, 97% and stun immunity by 6%, 20%, 31%, 40%, 48%.

At level 4 it also makes you levitate slightly above the ground, allowing you to ignore some traps.

At level 5 it also grants 5%, 11%, 17%, 22%, 27% movement speed and removes 2, 5, 8, 11, 13 fatigue.
talents.name: Feather Wind

talents.info_text:
Conjures a furious, raging lightning storm with a radius of 6 that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a random lightning bolt will hit up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 of your foes for 1 to 49, 66, 79, 90, 100 damage (24, 33, 39, 45, 50 average) in a radius of 1.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Thunderstorm

description: Crush the souls of your foes to improve yourself.
name: animus

talents.info_text:
Crush and consume one of your captured souls, healing you for 379, 498, 591, 669, 738 life and restoring 126, 166, 197, 223, 246 mana.

The life and mana healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Consume Soul

talents.info_text:
Your hunger for souls grows ever more. When you kill a creature you rip away its animus with great force, granting you a 25%, 57%, 70%, 77%, 81% chance to gain one additional soul.

In addition you are able to store 2, 4, 5, 7, 8 more souls.
talents.name: Animus Hoarder

talents.info_text:
Try to crush the soul of your foe, doing 212, 286, 343, 392, 435 darkness damage (that can never kill the target).

If the target is left with less than 10%, 16%, 20%, 23%, 26% life you try to take control of its body.

Should this succeed the target becomes your permanent minion (unaffected by your aura) and you regain 2 souls.

Husks prossess the same abilities as they had in life (affected by Dark Empathy), are healed to full when created but can never heal or be healed by any means.

Only one husk can be controlled at any time, if this spell is cast again it will dispell the previous husk, even if no new one is created.

Bosses, other undeads and summoned creatures can not be turned into husks.

The damage and chance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Animus Purge

talents.info_text:
Crush and consume two souls to empower your next 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 spells, granting them a special effect.

Affected spells are:

  • Undeath Link: in addition to the heal a shield is created for half the heal power
  • Create Minions: allows you to summon 2 more minions
  • Assemble: allows you to summon a second bone golem
  • Invoke Darkness: becomes a cone of darkness
  • Shadow Tunnel: teleported minions will also be healed for 30% of their max life
  • Cold Flames: freeze chance increased to 100%
  • Freeze: becomes a ball of radius 2 and makes all targets wet
  • Consume Soul: effect increased by 50%
talents.name: Essence of the Dead

description: Arcane studies manipulate the raw magic energies to shape them into both offensive and defensive spells.
name: arcane

talents.info_text:
Conjures up mana into a powerful bolt doing 146, 196, 236, 269, 299 arcane damage.

At level 3, it becomes a beam.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Manathrust

talents.info_text: Your mastery of magic allows you to enter a state of deep concentration, increasing your Spellpower by 5, 10, 14, 18, 21 and arcane resistance by 23%, 29%, 34%, 38%, 42%.
talents.name: Arcane Power

talents.info_text:
Creates a vortex of arcane energies on the target for 6 turns. Each turn the vortex will look for another foe in sight and fire a manathrust doing 36, 49, 59, 67, 75 arcane damage to all foes in line.

If no foes are found, the target will take 50% more arcane damage.

If the target dies, the vortex explodes, releasing all remaining damage in a radius 2 ball of arcane force.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Arcane Vortex

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with arcane forces, disrupting any attempts to harm you by creating a shield of pure aether which can absorb 292, 394, 474, 541, 600 damage.

In combat, the mental focus required to maintain and monitor the shield is too much and you let it run on its own. In this state once the shield power is depleted it will start using your mana to absorb hits, at a ratio of 1.03, 0.64, 0.50, 0.43, 0.38 mana per damage.

Whenever mana is used by the shield it stores a remnant of this energy (up to 200 max). When the shield is deactivated any stored energy is released in a radius 5 arcane storm that lasts 5 turns, dealing 20% of the total stored damage each turn.

Outside of combat the shield regenerates 10% of its power each turn and stored energy quickly dissipates.

Dropping below 50% mana or reaching max energy storage will automatically deactivate this talent.

The shield power improves with your Spellpower.

The maximum energy storage is based on your total mana (ignoring sustained spells).

Current shield power: 0

Current stored energy: 0
talents.name: Disruption Shield

description: Conveyance is the school of travel. It allows you to travel faster and to track others.
name: conveyance

talents.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a small range of up to 12, 14, 16, 17, 18 grids.

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 5, 3, 2, 2, 1).

If the target area is not in line of sight, there is a chance the spell will partially fail and teleport the target randomly.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Phase Door

talents.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a large range (110, 125, 150, 175, 200).

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 19, 18, 17, 16, 15).

If the target area is not in line of sight, there is a chance the spell will partially fail and teleport the target randomly.

Random teleports have a minimum range of 15.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Teleport

talents.info_text:
This intricate spell erects a space distortion around the caster that is linked to another distortion, placed around a target.

Any time the caster should take damage, there is a 45%, 51%, 56%, 62%, 67% chance that it will instead be warped by the shield and hit the designated target.

Once the maximum damage (308, 399, 469, 528, 581) is absorbed, the time runs out (13, 16, 19, 23, 25 turns), or the target dies, the shield will crumble.

The max damage the shield can absorb will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Displacement Shield

talents.info_text:
When you hit a solid surface, this spell tears down the laws of probability to make you instantly appear on the other side.

Teleports up to 14, 18, 21, 24, 26 grids.

After a successful probability travel you are left unstable, unable to do it again for a number of turns equal to 400%, 350%, 300%, 250%, 200% of the number of tiles you blinked through.

The range will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Probability Travel

description: Harness the power of the world to turn into a Deeprock Form.
name: deeprock

talents.info_text:
You call upon the very core of the world, harnessing its power to transform your body.

For 14, 16, 17, 18, 19 turns you become a Deeprock Elemental, gaining two size categories.

This increases your Physical damage by 21%, 26%, 31%, 34%, 38% and Physical damage penetration by 6.8%, 8.6%, 10%, 12%, 14%, and armour by 7, 8, 9, 10, 11.

The effects increase with spellpower.
talents.name: Deeprock Form

talents.info_text:
When you turn into a Deeprock elemental your Arcane damage is increased by 21%, 26%, 31%, 34%, 38%, Arcane damage penetration by 6.8%, 8.6%, 10%, 12%, 14% and you gain the power to invoke volcanos:

Effective talent level: 2.0, 4.0, 6.0, 8.0, 10

Use mode: Activated

Mana cost: 10

Range: 10

Cooldown: 20

Travel Speed: 200% of base

Usage Speed: Spell (100% of a turn)

Is: a spell

Description: Summons a small raging volcano for 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns. Every turn, it will fire a molten boulder towards up to 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 of your foes, dealing 31, 43, 52, 60, 66 fire and 31, 43, 52, 60, 66 physical damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Volcanic Rock

talents.info_text:
When you turn into a Deeprock elemental your Nature damage is increased by 21%, 26%, 31%, 34%, 38%, Nature damage penetration by 6.8%, 8.6%, 10%, 12%, 14% and you gain the power to throw boulders:

Effective talent level: 2.0, 4.0, 6.0, 8.0, 10

Use mode: Activated

Equilibrium cost: 5

Range: 10

Cooldown: 3

Travel Speed: instantaneous

Usage Speed: Standard (100% of a turn)

Is: a nature gift

Description: Throw a huge boulder, dealing 170, 236, 286, 328, 366 physical damage and knocking targets back 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 tiles within radius 1.

The damage will increase with your Strength.
talents.name: Boulder Rock

talents.info_text:
While in deeprock form, you become indomitable, granting you 28%, 38%, 46%, 52%, 57% resistance to cuts, poisons, diseases and stuns.

At level 5 and higher, while Deeprock Form is active, all incoming damage is applied against physical resistance instead of the normal resistance type.
talents.name: Mountainhewn

description: Divination allows the caster to sense its surroundings, and find hidden things.
name: divination

talents.info_text:
Summons an ethereal magical eye at the designated location that lasts for 13, 16, 19, 23, 26 turns.

The eye cannot be seen or attacked by other creatures, and possesses magical vision that allows it to see any creature in a 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 range around it.

It does not require light to do so, but it cannot see through walls.

Casting the eye does not take a turn.

Only one arcane eye can exist at any given time.

At level 4, if cast on a creature it will follow it until it expires, or until the creature dies.

At level 5, it will place a magical marker on the creatures, negating invisibility and stealth effects.
talents.name: Arcane Eye

talents.info_text:
You focus your senses, getting information from moments in the future.

Improves your capacity to see invisible foes by +26, +36, +43, +49, +54, to see through stealth by +11, +15, +18, +21, +23, and to perform a critical spell cast by +6%, +9%, +10%, +12%, +13%.

The effects will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Keen Senses

talents.info_text: Form a map of your surroundings in your mind in a radius of 11, 14, 15, 17, 18
talents.name: Vision

talents.info_text:
Echoes of the future flash before your eyes, allowing you to sense some incoming attacks.

If the attack is not physical, you will erect a temporary shield that reduces all damage of this type by 24%, 29%, 33%, 36%, 39% for 5 turns.

This effect can only happen once every 5 turns, and happens before damage is taken.

The bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Premonition

description: Harness the power of the earth to protect and destroy.
name: earth

talents.info_text:
Fire a powerful beam of stone-shaterring force, digging out any walls in its path up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 range.

The beam continues to a range of 10, affecting any creatures in its path, dealing 146, 196, 236, 269, 299 physical damage to them.

If any walls are dug, you gain 15%, 20%, 24%, 28%, 31% physical damage bonus for 6 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Pulverizing Auger

talents.info_text:
The caster's skin grows as hard as stone, granting a 13, 17, 21, 24, 27 bonus to Armour.

Each time you are hit in melee, you have a 39%, 75%, 84%, 88%, 90% chance to reduce the cooldown of an Earth or Stone spell by 2 (this effect can only happen once per turn).

The bonus to Armour will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Stone Skin

talents.info_text:
Conjures a mudslide, dealing 159, 214, 257, 294, 326 physical damage in a radius of 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. Any creatures caught inside will be knocked back 8 spaces.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Mudslide

talents.info_text:
Entomb yourself in a wall of stone for 8, 11, 12, 14, 15 turns.

At level 4, it becomes targetable.

Any hostile creature caught in the radius will also suffer 159, 214, 257, 294, 326 physical damage.

Duration and damage will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Stone Wall

description: Infuse arcane forces into your shield.
name: eldritch shield

talents.info_text:
Channel eldritch forces into a melee attack, hitting the target with your weapon and shield for 168%, 258%, 345%, 430%, 515% arcane damage.

If either attack hits, the target will be stunned for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns and you automatically Block.

The chance for the attack to stun increases with your Physical Power, but it is considered a magical attack and thus is resisted with spell save, rather than physical save.

Damage increases with Spellpower.
talents.name: Eldritch Blow

talents.info_text:
Imbues your shields with arcane power, dealing 24, 32, 38, 44, 48 arcane damage with each melee strike and 17, 22, 27, 31, 34 arcane damage when hit.

Allows counterstrikes after incomplete blocks and the cooldown of Block is reduced by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 turns.

The damage will increase with Spellpower.
talents.name: Eldritch Infusion

talents.info_text:
Channel eldritch forces into a ferocious melee attack, hitting the target three times with your shields doing 106%, 126%, 141%, 153%, 164% Nature damage.

If any of the attacks hit, the target will be dazed for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns and your Block cooldown is reset.

The chance for the attack to daze increases with you Physical Power, but it is considered a magical attack and thus is resisted with spell save, rather than physical save.
talents.name: Eldritch Fury

talents.info_text:
Slam your shield on the ground creating a shockwave.

You perform a melee attack for 190%, 216%, 235%, 251%, 266% arcane damage against everyone within radius 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.

Any creature hit by the attack will be submitted to a Counterstrike effect for 3 turns, as if you had blocked against them.

At level 5 your Block cooldown is reset.
talents.name: Eldritch Slam

description: Summon stony spikes imbued with various powers.
name: eldritch stone

talents.info_text:
Stony spikes erupt from the ground in a radius 4, 5, 5, 5, 5 cone.

Creatures caught in the area will be cut for 159, 214, 257, 294, 326 Physical damage dealt over 6 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower, and the chance to apply the detrimental effect(s) improves with Spellpower or Physical Power, whichever is greater.
talents.name: Stone Spikes

talents.info_text:
Coats your stone spikes with insidious poison, dealing 126, 170, 204, 233, 259 total nature damage over 6 turns while reducing all healing by 52%, 58%, 62%, 64%, 66%.

The damage increases with Spellpower and the chance to poison and healing reduction increases with either Spellpower or Physical Power, whichever is greater.
talents.name: Poisoned Spikes

talents.info_text:
Imbues your stone spikes with arcane forces, dealing 113, 152, 183, 209, 232 Arcane damage and silencing each target hit for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage increases with Spellpower and the chance to silence increases with either Spellpower or Physical Power, whichever is greater.
talents.name: Eldritch Spikes

talents.info_text:
Your stone spikes grow in length, instantly dealing 126, 170, 204, 233, 259 Physical damage and disarming targets hit for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage increases with Spellpower and the chance to disarm increases with either Spellpower or Physical Power, whichever is greater.
talents.name: Impaling Spikes

description: Alchemical control over lightning energies.
name: energy alchemy

talents.info_text:
When you throw your alchemist bombs, you infuse them with lightning damage that can daze your foes.

In addition all lightning damage you do is increased by 5%, 12%, 18%, 22%, 26%.

You cannot have more than one alchemist infusion sustain active at once.
talents.name: Lightning Infusion

talents.info_text:
While Lightning Infusion is active, your bombs energize your golem.

All talents on cooldown on your golem have 24%, 51%, 64%, 72%, 76% chance to be reduced by 1.
talents.name: Dynamic Recharge

talents.info_text:
By crushing an alchemist gem you generate a thunderclap in a cone of radius 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 dealing 79, 107, 129, 147, 163 physical damage and 79, 107, 129, 147, 163 lightning damage.

All creatures caught inside are knocked back and disarmed for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The duration and damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Thunderclap

talents.info_text:
Infuse your body with lightning energy, bolstering your movement speed by +5%, +8%, +10%, +13%, +16%.

Each turn, a foe within range 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 will be struck by lightning and be dealt 42, 57, 69, 78, 87 Lightning damage.

In addition, damage to your health will energize you.

At the start of each turn in which you have lost at least 200 life (20% of your maximum life) since your last turn, you will gain 82%, 94%, 102%, 110%, 117% of a turn.

The effects increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Living Lightning

description: Magical enhancement of your body.
name: enhancement

talents.info_text:
Strike twice with your mainhand weapon dealing 78%, 86%, 92%, 97%, 101% Arcane damage.

If either of these attacks hit you gain 35, 48, 58, 66, 73 mana.

The mana gain will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Arcane Strike

talents.info_text:
Engulfs your hands (and weapons) in a sheath of fire, dealing 24, 32, 38, 44, 48 fire damage per melee attack and increasing all fire damage dealt by 7%, 10%, 12%, 14%, 16%.

Each hit will also regenerate 0.37, 0.73, 1.10, 1.47, 1.83 stamina.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fiery Hands

talents.info_text:
Engulfs your hands (and weapons) in a sheath of lightning, dealing 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 lightning damage with a chance to daze (25%) per melee attack and increasing all lightning damage dealt by 7%, 10%, 12%, 14%, 16%.

Each hit will also regenerate 0.37, 0.73, 1.10, 1.47, 1.83 mana.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shock Hands

talents.info_text:
You concentrate on your inner self, increasing your Strength, Dexterity, Magic, and Cunning by 10, 13, 16, 19, 21.

Additionally, you gain a shield absorbing 158, 214, 257, 293, 326 damage before you take damage every 10 turns.

The stat increase and shield will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Inner Power

description: Manipulate gems to turn them into explosive magical bombs.
name: explosive admixtures

talents.info_text:
Imbue an alchemist gem with an explosive charge of mana and throw it.

The gem will explode for 1.0 fire damage.

Each kind of gem will also provide a specific effect.

The damage will improve with better gems and with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Throw Bomb

talents.info_text:
Grants 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100% protection to you, your golem and other friendly creatures against the elemental damage of your own bombs, and against external elemental damage (fire, cold, lightning and acid) by 3%, 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%.

At talent level 5 it also protects against all side effects of your bombs.
talents.name: Alchemist Protection

talents.info_text:
Your alchemist bombs now affect a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 around them.

Explosion damage may increase by 0% (if the explosion is not contained) to 27%, 40%, 61%, 101%, 216% if the area of effect is confined.
talents.name: Explosion Expert

talents.info_text:
Crush together two alchemist gems, making them extremely unstable.

You then throw them to a target area, where they explode on impact, dealing 1.00 physical damage and knocking back any creatures in the blast radius.

Each kind of gem will also provide a specific effect.

The damage will improve with better gems and with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shockwave Bomb

description: Harness the power of fire to burn your foes to ashes.
name: fire

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of fire, setting the target ablaze and doing 185, 250, 300, 343, 380 fire damage over 3 turns.

At level 5, it will create a beam of flames.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Flame

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a cone of flame with radius 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. Any targets caught in the area will suffer Burning Shock, stunning them and dealing 159, 214, 257, 294, 326 fire damage over 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Flameshock

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of fire that moves toward the target and explodes into a flash of fire, doing 212, 286, 343, 392, 435 fire damage in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fireflash

talents.info_text:
Raging flames burn foes and allies alike, doing 49, 66, 79, 90, 100 fire damage in a radius of 5 each turn for 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Inferno

description: Alchemical control over fire.
name: fire alchemy

talents.info_text:
When you throw your alchemist bombs, you infuse them with flames that burn for a few turns.

In addition all fire damage you do is increased by 5%, 12%, 18%, 22%, 26%.

You cannot have more than one alchemist infusion sustain active at once.
talents.name: Flame Infusion

talents.info_text:
Throw a smoke bomb, blocking everyone's line of sight. The smoke dissipates after 7, 9, 10, 12, 13 turns.

If a creature inside is victim of fire burns the smoke will consume instantly, replicating the burns on all foes and increasing its duration by 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns.

Duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Smoke Bomb

talents.info_text:
A furious fire storm rages around the caster, doing 74, 100, 120, 137, 152 fire damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 11, 12, 12, 13, 13 turns.

You closely control the firestorm, preventing it from harming your party members.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fire Storm

talents.info_text:
Turn your body into pure flame, increasing your fire resistance by 26%, 36%, 43%, 49%, 54%, burning any creatures striking you in melee for 14, 20, 23, 27, 30 fire damage, and randomly launching up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 slow-moving fire bolt(s) per turn at targets in sight, each dealing 42, 57, 68, 78, 87 fire damage.

The projectiles safely go through your friends without harming them.

The damage and resistance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Body of Fire

description: Alchemical control over frost.
name: frost alchemy

talents.info_text:
When you throw your alchemist bombs, you infuse them with cold damage that can freeze your foes.

In addition all cold damage you do is increased by 5%, 12%, 18%, 22%, 26%.

You cannot have more than one alchemist infusion sustain active at once.
talents.name: Frost Infusion

talents.info_text:
While Frost Infusion is active, your bombs deposit a layer of ice on your golem for 7, 9, 10, 12, 13 turns when they hit it.

This ice provides your golem with 14, 19, 23, 26, 29 additional armour, melee attacks against it deal 0.0 Cold damage to the attacker, and 50% of its damage is converted to Cold.

The effects increase with your talent level and with the Spellpower and damage modifiers of your golem.
talents.name: Ice Armour

talents.info_text:
Invoke a blast of cold all around you with a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, doing 159, 214, 257, 294, 326 Cold damage and freezing creatures to the ground for 7, 9, 10, 12, 13 turns.

Affected creatures can still act, but cannot move.

The duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Flash Freeze

talents.info_text:
Turn your body into pure ice, increasing your Cold damage affinity by 5%, 10%, 15%, 18%, 21% and your physical resistance by 16%, 21%, 25%, 29%, 32%.

You have a 11%, 25%, 36%, 45%, 53% chance to shrug off all direct critical hits (physical, mental, spell).

The effects increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ice Core

description: Combine the power of steamtech and arcane forces to destroy your foes with fire and lightning.
name: galvanic technomancy

talents.info_text:
You summon a galvanic rod at a location. Upon arrival the rod releases a shock in radius 1, 1, 1, 1, 2 dealing 172, 232, 279, 318, 353 galvanic damage (fire and lightning) to all creatures.

You have 3 rods each with their own 9 turns cooldown.

This spell works with Burning Wake.

This spell has 25% chance to try to activate Hurricane, if used.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Galvanic Rod

talents.info_text:
Using your arcane power you force galvanic rods to linger for 25 turns. While lingering they are inert, but can link up to other rods.

When two rods are present in range 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 of one another they link with a galvanic beam.

When three rods are present in range 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 of one another they link with a triangular galvanic zone.

Any creature caught in a galvanic beam or zone take 33, 44, 53, 61, 68 galvanic damage per turn.

You can maintain at most 3 rods.

At level 3 all affected creatures are shocked, reducing their stun and pin resistances by half.

At level 5 your weapon (if metallic, or embedded with a metallic tinker) acts as a rod that does not count towards your maximum.

This spell has 15% chance to try to activate Hurricane, if used.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Galvanic Arcing

talents.info_text:
Reaching through the aether you temporarily destabilize a galvanic rod's control systems. (Using your weapon as a rod does not count as a valid target)

This creates a blast in radius 1 around it, or through all connected rods if they are linked dealing 199, 268, 322, 367, 408 galvanic damage to all creatures and stunning them for 3, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns.

This spell works with Burning Wake.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Unstable Blast

talents.info_text:
Using large amounts of arcane power you create a supercharged Unstable Blast in your rods.

The extra energy is briefly converted to a huge mass, pulling in all creatures (but you) in range 2, 4, 6, 6, 7 of any rod towards the center of the galvanic field.

Can only be used with a triangular field is setup.
talents.name: Energy Mass Conversion

description: Learn to craft and upgrade your golem.
name: golemancy

talents.info_text: Improves your golem's proficiency with weapons, increasing its attack and damage.
talents.name: Golem Power

talents.info_text: Improves your golem's armour training, damage resistance, and healing efficiency.
talents.name: Golem Resilience

talents.info_text: You invoke your golem to your side, granting it a temporary melee power increase of 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 for 5 turns.
talents.name: Invoke Golem

talents.info_text: Teleport to your golem, while your golem teleports to your location. Your foes will be confused, and those that were attacking you will have a 40%, 55%, 70%, 85%, 100% chance to target your golem instead.
talents.name: Golem Portal

description: Learn to craft and upgrade your golem.
name: golemancy

talents.info_text:
Interact with your golem to check its inventory, talents, …

Note: You can also do that while taking direct control of the golem.
talents.name: Interact with the Golem

talents.info_text:
Take care of your golem:

  • If it is destroyed, you will take some time to reconstruct it (this takes 15 alchemist gems and 20 turns).
  • If it is alive but hurt, you will be able to repair it for 0 (takes 2 alchemist gems). Spellpower, alchemist gem and Golem Power talent all influence the healing done.
talents.name: Refit Golem

description: Use the rotting cold doom of the tomb to fell your foes.
name: grave

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of cold that moves toward the target and explodes into a chilly circle of death, doing 179, 241, 289, 330, 367 cold damage in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

Additionally, when Will o' the Wisp is sustained, minions killed by this spell will spawn Wisps.
talents.name: Chill of the Tomb

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with undead energies. When one of your minions is destroyed while inside your necrotic aura, it has a 41%, 52%, 63%, 74%, 85% chance to create a will o' the wisp.

The will o' the wisp will take a random target in sight and home in on it. When it reaches the target, it will explode for 212, 279, 331, 375, 414 cold damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Will o' the Wisp

talents.info_text:
Cold Flames slowly spread from 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 spots in a radius of 3 around the targeted location. The flames deal 55, 74, 89, 102, 113 cold damage, and have a chance of freezing.

Damage improves with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Cold Flames

talents.info_text:
Vampiric energies fill you; each time you deal damage, you have 25%, 32%, 37%, 42%, 46% chance to heal for 17%, 22%, 25%, 28%, 30% of the damage done.

The absorption percent will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Vampiric Gift

description: Spell talents of the various horrors of the world.
name: horror spells

talents.info_text: Creates a shroud of darkness over a radius 3 area that lasts 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns. The shroud causes 24, 32, 38, 44, 48 darkness damage each turn, reduces light radius by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and darkness resistance by 23%, 31%, 38%, 43%, 48% of those within.
talents.name: Abyssal Shroud

talents.info_text: Open a hole in space, summoning an animated blade for 10 turns.
talents.name: Animate Blade

description: Harness the power of ice to freeze and shatter your foes.
name: ice

talents.info_text:
Condenses ambient water on a target, freezing it for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns and damaging it for 150, 228, 305, 383, 463.

If this is used on a friendly target the cooldown is reduced by 33%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Freeze

talents.info_text:
Blast a wave of cold all around you with a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, doing 179, 241, 289, 330, 367 cold damage and freezing creatures to the ground for 4 turns.

Affected creatures can still act, but cannot move.

For each affected creature that is also wet the cooldown of Shatter decreases by 2.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Frozen Ground

talents.info_text:
Shatter all frozen targets in your line of sight, doing 205, 277, 333, 380, 421 cold damage.

Depending on the target's rank, there will also be an additional effect:

  • Critters will be instantly killed
  • +50% critical chance against Normal rank
  • +25% critical chance against Elites or Bosses

All affected foes will get the wet effect.

At most, it will affect 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 foes.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shatter

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with Uttercold, increasing all your cold damage by 2.8%, 5.4%, 7.5%, 9.2%, 11% and ignoring 18%, 30%, 39%, 46%, 52% cold resistance of your targets

In addition you pierce through iceblocks easily, reducing damage absorbed from your attacks by iceblocks by 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%.
talents.name: Uttercold

description: Meta spells alter the working of magic itself.
name: meta

talents.info_text:
Removes up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 magical effects (good effects from foes, and bad effects from friends) from the target.

At level 3, it can be targeted.
talents.name: Disperse Magic

talents.info_text:
You learn to finely craft and tune your offensive spells.

You try to carve a hole in spells that affect an area to avoid damaging yourself. The chance of success is 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%.

In addition, you hone your damaging spells to spellshock their targets. Whenever you deal damage with a spell you attempt to spellshock them with 51, 69, 83, 94, 105 more Spellpower than normal. Spellshocked targets suffer a temporary 20% penalty to damage resistances.
talents.name: Spellcraft

talents.info_text: Reduces the cooldown of all spells by 6%, 13%, 20%, 26%, 30%.
talents.name: Quicken Spells

talents.info_text: Your mastery of arcane flows allow you to reset the cooldown of up to 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 of your spells (that don't have a fixed cooldown) of tier 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 or less.
talents.name: Metaflow

description: Gain control over death, eventually turning into a lich.
name: necrosis

talents.info_text: The line between life and death blurs for you; you can only die when you reach -61, -122, -183, -244, -304 life.
talents.name: Blurred Mortality

talents.info_text:
Your target's doom draws near. Its healing factor is reduced by 80%, and will take 114%, 121%, 125%, 127%, 129% of its remaining life (or 767, 965, 1119, 1249, 1364, whichever is lower) over 10 turns as arcane damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Impending Doom

talents.info_text:
Absorb up to 64%, 70%, 73%, 76%, 77% of the maximum life of each of your necrotic minions (even negative life, possibly destroying them). This will heal you for the greatest amount absorbed.

The healing will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Undeath Link

talents.info_text:
This is your true goal and the purpose of all necromancy - to become a powerful and everliving Lich!

If you are killed while this spell is active, the arcane forces you unleash will be able to rebuild your body into the desired Lichform.

All liches gain the following intrinsics:

  • Poison, cut, and fear immunity.
  • 100% disease and stun resistance.
  • 20% cold and darkness resistance.
  • No need to breathe.
  • Infusions do not work.

Also:

  • At level 1: -3 to all stats, -10% to all resistances. Such meagre devotion!
  • At level 2: Nothing.
  • At level 3: +3 Magic and Willpower, +1 life rating (not retroactive).
  • At level 4: +3 Magic and Willpower, +2 life rating (not retroactive), +10 spell and mental saves, Celestial/Star Fury category (0.7) and 0.1 negative energies regeneration.
  • At level 5: +5 Magic and Willpower, +2 life rating (not retroactive), +10 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 10%, Celestial/Star Fury category (0.9) and 0.5 negative energy regeneration.
  • At level 6: +6 Magic, Willpower and Cunning, +3 life rating (not retroactive), +15 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 15%, Celestial/Star Fury category (1.1) and 1.0 negative energy regeneration.
  • At level 7: Your power becomes overwhelming! +12 Magic, Willpower and Cunning, 60% chance to ignore critical hits, +4 life rating (not retroactive), +35 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 15%, Celestial/Star Fury category (1.3) and 1.0 negative energy regeneration.

The undead cannot use this talent.

While active, it will drain 4 mana per turn.

Once you die and turn into a Lich you can not invest any more in this talent.
talents.name: Lichform
require: Level 20, Mag 40; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 21, Mag 42; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 22, Mag 44; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 23, Mag 46; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 24, Mag 48; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead

description: Create and empower dumb undead minions.
name: necrotic minions

talents.info_text:
Fires powerful undead energies through your necrotic aura. For each recent death that happened inside your aura, you will raise an undead minion (up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 minions). These minions will be raised within a cone that extends to the edge of your necrotic aura.

The minions level is your level -6, -3, -1, +1, +2.

Each minion has a chance to be:

Degenerated skeleton warrior: 53%, 36%, 22%, 12%, 3%

Skeleton warrior: 10%, 13%, 16%, 19%, 22%

Armoured skeleton warrior: 0%, 3%, 6%, 9%, 13%

Skeleton archer: 10%, 17%, 19%, 18%, 13%

Skeleton master archer: 0%, 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%

Skeleton mage: 5%, 7%, 9%, 11%, 13%

Ghoul: 19%, 16%, 12%, 9%, 6%

Ghast: 0%, 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%

Ghoulking: 0%, 0%, 3%, 5%, 8%
talents.name: Create Minions

talents.info_text:
Your dark power radiates further as you grow stronger. Increases the radius of your necrotic aura by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and reduces the decay rate of your minions outside the aura by 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, 5%.

At level 3, necrotic minions inside your aura have a 25% chance to refund their soul on death. If a minion turns into a will o' the wisp then the wisp will have that chance instead.
talents.name: Aura Mastery

talents.info_text:
A surge of power radiates to all your minions, increasing their Physical Power, Spellpower and Accuracy by 35, 48, 58, 66, 73, their Armour penetration by 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 and their critical hit chance by 14, 19, 23, 26, 29 for 6 turns.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Surge of Undeath

talents.info_text:
You share your powers with your minions, granting them 48%, 65%, 78%, 89%, 99% of your resistances and saves.

In addition all damage done by your minions to you or your other minions is reduced by 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%.

The effect will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Dark Empathy

description: Manipulate darkness itself to slaughter your foes.
name: nightfall

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of darkness, doing 146, 196, 236, 269, 299 darkness damage.

At level 3, it will create a beam of shadows.

At level 5, none of your Nightfall spells will hurt your minions.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Invoke Darkness

talents.info_text:
Dark fumes erupt from the ground for 5 turns. Any creature entering the circle will receive either a bane of confusion or a bane of blindness.

Only one bane can affect a creature.

Banes last for 4, 5, 5, 6, 6 turns, and also deal 24, 32, 38, 44, 48 darkness damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Death

talents.info_text:
Invoke a cone dealing 146, 196, 236, 269, 299 darkness damage in a radius of 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. Any creatures caught inside must make check against their Mental Save or be knocked back 4 grids away.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fear the Night

talents.info_text:
Invoke a ball of darkness that deals 179, 241, 289, 330, 367 darkness damage in a radius of 1. Every creature hit will start to become closer to death, reducing their global speed by 7%, 14%, 21%, 28%, 35%.

Necrotic minions' damage against those creatures is increased by 27%, 33%, 38%, 42%, 45%.

The effects last for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns.

The damage done and the minions' damage increase will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Rigor Mortis

description: Spell abilities of the various objects of the world.
name: object spells

talents.info_text: Removes up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 detrimental magical effects and empowers you with arcane energy for ten turns, increasing spellpower and spell save by 5 plus 5 per effect removed.
talents.name: Arcane Supremacy

talents.info_text: Alter the flow of energies through a staff.
talents.name: Command Staff

talents.info_text:
You absorb latent cold around you, turning into an ice elemental - a shivgoroth - for 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

While transformed, you do not need to breathe, gain access to the Ice Storm talent at level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, gain 68%, 88%, 100%, 100%, 100% resistance to cuts and stuns, gain 34%, 44%, 50%, 50%, 50% cold resistance, and all cold damage heals you for 118%, 138%, 150%, 150%, 150% of the damage done.

The power will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shivgoroth Form

description: Combine the power of steamtech and arcane forces to destroy your foes with arcane and time.
name: occult technomancy

talents.info_text:
You imbue a steamsaw with arcane and temporal forces, making it spin very fast around your waist (ignoring requirements).

The saw spins so fast it it disturbs spacetime around you, increasing your spellpower by up to 11, 25, 36, 45, 53, your spell critical chance by up to 3, 5, 7, 9, 10 and your mana regen by up to 0.6, 1.9, 2.8, 3.6, 4.3 (depending on steamsaw tier).

Any melee attack against you also triggers an automatic steamsaw attack that cannot miss dealing 146%, 166%, 181%, 193%, 204% weapon damage as occult damage (arcane and temporal).

The steamsaw used will provide its bonus as if it was worn, but you can not Block with it.

Increases steamsaws weapon damage by 31%, 44%, 54%, 62%, 69% and uses Magic instead of Strength to determine their damage.

If using Aether Avatar, all Occult Technomancy spells become usable for its duration and all occult damage becomes pure arcane.

When you first learn this talent you also learn the Steamsaw tinker creation if you didn't already know it.
talents.name: Metaphasic Spin

talents.info_text:
Spin your saw at incredible speeds for an instant, fully breaking reality in a 3-wide beam in front of you.

Any creatures caught by the beam take 239, 322, 387, 442, 490 occult damage and are untethered from reality, reducing their global speed by 5%, 11%, 16%, 22%, 27% and the speed of any projectiles they fire by 37%, 49%, 57%, 65%, 72% for 4 turns.

At level 3 any projectiles caught in the beam are instantly annihilated.

At level 5 the beam is so strong that all creatures caught inside are knocked back 3 tiles.

The breach is so deep that the beam will always have the maximum possible length it can.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Reality Breach

talents.info_text:
You reach out through the aether to all creatures in sight that were slowed by Reality Breach or Congeal Time.

For each target you create a link of arcane infused steam to it that lasts 6, 10, 12, 14, 15 turns.

Any time the target uses a talent one of your cooling down spells is reduced by 1 (prioritizing Technomancy spells).

Each turn the link is up the target and any creature inside the link takes 14, 19, 23, 26, 29 occult damage.

As long as at least one link is up, the cooldown of your Metaphasic Spin spell is set to 6 turns instead of 30.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ethereal Steam

talents.info_text:
Using your sheer arcane power you keep breaches in spacetime open for 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns.

Each turn you they are open you project an occult clone of your saw along each breach, damaging any creature caught for 75%, 89%, 100%, 110%, 118% occult weapon damage.

The saw cuts both in a physical and arcane way, reducing the duration of a random beneficial effect on each target by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 each time.

Each target can only be affected once per turn.

This spell is only usable for one turn after casting Reality Breach but any Reality Breach cast during its duration is also recorded inside.
talents.name: Metaphasic Echoes

description: Talents of the various entities of the world.
name: other

talents.info_text: Try to confuse the target's mind for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 (power 19%, 37%, 42%, 44%, 45%) turns.
talents.name: Mind Disruption

talents.info_text:
Condenses ambient water on a target, inflicting 49, 71, 89, 105, 120 cold damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Water Bolt

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of fire, setting the target ablaze and doing 113, 152, 183, 209, 232 fire damage over 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Flame Bolt

talents.info_text:
Hurl ice shard at the target dealing 87, 117, 141, 161, 178 ice damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ice Bolt

talents.info_text:
Projects a bolt of pure blight, doing 113, 152, 183, 209, 232 blight damage.

This spell has an improved critical strike chance of +7.57%, +13%, +18%, +23%, +27%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blight Bolt

talents.info_text:
Condenses ambient water on a target, inflicting 41, 59, 73, 86, 98 cold damage and stunning it for 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower
talents.name: Water Jet

talents.info_text:
Fires a blast of void energies that slowly travel to their target, dealing 152, 205, 247, 282, 312 arcane damage on impact.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Void Blast

talents.info_text: Call upon the forces of nature to cure your body of 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 poisons and diseases.
talents.name: Restoration

talents.info_text:
Call upon the forces of nature to regenerate your body for 19, 24, 28, 31, 34 life every turn for 10 turns.

The life healed increases with Spellpower.
talents.name: Regeneration

talents.info_text: Fire a slow bolt of a random element for 211, 298, 365, 422, 471 damage. Damage increases with the magic stat.
talents.name: Elemental Bolt

talents.info_text:
Summons a small raging volcano for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns. Every turn, it will fire a molten boulder towards up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 of your foes, dealing 24, 33, 39, 45, 50 fire and 24, 33, 39, 45, 50 physical damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Volcano

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a fist of stone, doing 146, 196, 236, 269, 299 physical damage and knocking the target back 3 grids.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Strike

talents.info_text:
Corrosive fumes rise from the ground doing 30, 40, 48, 55, 61 acid damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Corrosive Vapour

talents.info_text:
Engulf yourself in a surge of mana, quickly restoring 16, 20, 23, 26, 28 mana every turn for 10 turns.

The mana restored will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Manaflow

talents.info_text:
Exhale a wave of dark fire with radius 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. Any non demon caught in the area will take 116, 150, 176, 197, 216 fire damage, and flames will be left dealing a further 27, 35, 41, 46, 50 each turn. Demons will be healed for the same amount.

The damage will increase with your Strength Stat.
talents.name: Infernal Breath

talents.info_text:
Engulfs your hands (and weapons) in a sheath of frost, dealing 11, 15, 19, 21, 24 cold damage per melee attack and increasing all cold damage by 7%, 10%, 12%, 14%, 16%.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Frost Hands

talents.info_text:
Use arcane forces to summon 3, 4, 4, 4, 4 meteors that fall to the ground within range 2 of the target.

Each meteor smashes everything within radius 2, dealing 79, 107, 129, 147, 163 fire and 79, 107, 129, 147, 163 physical damage to creatures other than yourself, while liquefying some of the terrain into lava for 8 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Meteor Rain

talents.info_text:
Grab a target and pull it next to you, covering it with frost while reducing its movement speed by 50% for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The ice will also deal 87, 117, 141, 161, 178 cold damage.

The damage and chance to slow will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Frost Grab

talents.info_text: Designate a target as a martyr for 10 turns. When the martyr deals damage, it also damages itself for 16%, 26%, 33%, 37%, 41% of the damage dealt.
talents.name: Martyrdom

talents.info_text:
You reach out with shadowy vines toward your target, pulling it to you and silencing it for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns and dazing it for 2 turns.

The chance to hit improves with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Shadow Ambush

talents.info_text:
You take full control of your own shadow for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Your shadow possesses your talents and stats, has 55%, 61%, 64%, 67%, 69% life and deals 73%, 81%, 86%, 90%, 93% damage, -30% all resistances, -100% light resistance and +100% darkness resistance.

Your shadow is permanently stealthed (60, 74, 85, 95, 103 power), and all melee damage it deals is converted to darkness damage.

The shadow cannot teleport.

If you release control early or if it leaves your sight for too long, your shadow will dissipate.
talents.name: Ambuscade

talents.info_text:
For an instant, your weapons turn into a shadow leash that tries to grab the target's weapon, disarming it for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The chance to hit improves with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Shadow Leash

talents.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 at your feet; the circle lights up affected tiles, increases your positive energy by 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 each turn and deals 8.51, 11, 14, 16, 17 light damage and 8.51, 11, 14, 16, 17 fire damage per turn to everyone else within its radius. The circle lasts 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Blazing Light

talents.info_text:
A furious ice storm rages around the caster, doing 55, 74, 89, 102, 113 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 11, 12, 13, 14, 15 turns.

It has a 25% chance to freeze damaged targets.

If the target is wet the damage increases by 30% and the freeze chance increases to 50%.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ice Storm

talents.info_text:
Emits a necrotic aura, sustaining your undead minions in a radius of 2. Minions outside the radius will lose 10% life per turn.

Any creature you or your minions kill within your aura will be absorbed as a soul that can be used to raise minions.

Retch from your ghouls will also heal you, even if you are not undead.
talents.name: Necrotic Aura

talents.info_text:
The husk self-destructs, destroying itself and generating a blast of shadows in a radius of 4, doing 60, 150, 300, 450, 550 darkness damage.

This spell is only usable when the husk's master is dead.
talents.name: Self-destruction

talents.info_text:
Conjures 2, 2, 2, 2, 3 missile-shaped rocks that you target individually at any target or targets in range. Each missile deals 63, 85, 102, 116, 129 physical damage, and an additional 10, 14, 17, 19, 22 bleeding damage every turn for 5 turns.

At talent level 5, you can conjure one additional missile.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Earthen Missiles

talents.info_text: You fade from sight, making you invulnerable until the beginning of your next turn.
talents.name: Fade

talents.info_text: Teleports you within a small range.
talents.name: Phase Door

talents.info_text: With blinding speed you suddenly appear next to a target up to 10 spaces away and attack for 136%, 156%, 171%, 183%, 194% damage.
talents.name: Blindside

talents.info_text:
Strikes the target with a spark of lightning doing 42, 57, 68, 78, 86 to 126, 170, 204, 233, 259 damage (84, 113, 136, 155, 172 average).

The damage will increase with the Magic stat
talents.name: Shadow Lightning

talents.info_text:
Bathes the target in flames doing 87, 117, 141, 161, 178 damage

The damage will increase with the Magic stat
talents.name: Shadow Flames

talents.info_text: When a shadow is hit and killed, there is a 50% chance it will reform unhurt.
talents.name: Reform

talents.info_text: Spell damage done to it ripples in radius 4 doing 160% arcane damage.
talents.name: Arcane Amplification Drone Effect

talents.info_text:
Fire a blast of darkness at an enemy dealing 192, 259, 311, 355, 394 damage and destroying any walls in radius 3 around them.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Crumble

talents.info_text:
Evolve 5 allies within radius 10 in random ways for 5 turns.

Speed: Increases global speed by 24%, 33%, 40%, 45%, 50%.

Form: Increases all stats by 14, 19, 23, 26, 29.

Power: Increases all damage by 11%, 15%, 18%, 21%, 23%.
talents.name: Twisted Evolution

description: Combine the power of steamtech and arcane forces to destroy your foes.
name: other technomancy

talents.info_text:
After casting a technomancy spell you store some of its energies that you can then use to overload your arcane dynamo, increasing the steam it generates per 10 mana spent by 4 for 4 turns.

In addition the energies spills outward in radius 3, dealing 159, 214, 257, 294, 326 damage (damage type based on the type of technomancy spell used).

This spell is only usable after casting a technomancy spell and until you use any other spell or talent.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Electron Incantation

description: Control the power of tricks and illusions.
name: phantasm

talents.info_text:
Creates a globe of pure light within a radius of 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 that illuminates the area.

At level 3, it also blinds all who see it (except the caster) for 3, 3, 3, 3, 4 turns.

At level 4, it also deals 113, 152, 183, 209, 232 light damage.
talents.name: Illuminate

talents.info_text:
The caster's image blurs, granting a 14, 24, 33, 41, 49 bonus to Defense.

The bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blur Sight

talents.info_text:
The caster is surrounded by a phantasmal shield granting 10% chance to evade weapon attacks. If hit in melee, the shield will deal 48, 65, 78, 89, 99 light damage to the attacker.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Phantasmal Shield

talents.info_text:
The caster fades from sight, granting 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 bonus to invisibility.

Beware — you should take off your light, or you will still be easily spotted.

As you become invisible, you fade out of phase with reality. All your damage is reduced by 70%.

This powerful spell constantly drains your mana (2 per turn) while active.

The invisibility bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Invisibility

description: Invoke and control shades.
name: shades

talents.info_text:
Surround your minions in a veil of darkness. The darkness will teleport them to you, and grant them 55%, 68%, 78%, 86%, 93% evasion for 5 turns.

The evasion chance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shadow Tunnel

talents.info_text:
Reaches through the shadows into quieter places, summoning 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 harmless creatures.

Those creatures are then cursed with a Curse of Hate, making all hostile foes try to kill them.

If the summoned creatures are killed by hostile foes, you have 70% chance to gain a soul.
talents.name: Curse of the Meek

talents.info_text:
Through the shadows, you forge a temporary copy of yourself, existing for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The copy possesses your exact talents and stats, has 54%, 60%, 64%, 66%, 68% life and deals 73%, 80%, 85%, 88%, 91% damage.
talents.name: Forgery of Haze

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with Frostdusk, increasing all your darkness and cold damage by 2.8%, 5.4%, 7.5%, 9.2%, 11%, and ignoring 17%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% of the darkness resistance of your targets.

In addition, all darkness damage you take heals you for 11%, 27%, 38%, 46%, 52% of the damage.
talents.name: Frostdusk

description: Harness the power of magical staves.
name: staff combat

talents.info_text:
Channel raw mana through your staff, projecting a bolt of your staff's damage type, doing 72%, 86%, 96%, 105%, 113% staff damage.

The bolt will only hurt hostile targets, and pass safely through friendly ones.

This attack always has a 100% chance to hit, and ignores the target's Armour.

When projecting a bolt with your staff its damage modifier is increased by 20%.
talents.name: Channel Staff

talents.info_text: Increases weapon damage by 31%, 44%, 54%, 62%, 69% and physical power by 30 when using staves.
talents.name: Staff Mastery

talents.info_text: Adopt a defensive posture, increasing your Defense and Armour by 11, 15, 18, 21, 23.
talents.name: Defensive Posture

talents.info_text:
Hit a target for 123%, 133%, 140%, 146%, 152% melee damage and stun it for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

Stun chance will improve with Spellpower.

At level 5, this attack cannot miss.
talents.name: Blunt Thrust

description: Harness the power of the stone to protect and destroy.
name: stone

talents.info_text:
Conjures 2, 2, 2, 2, 3 missile-shaped rocks that you target individually at any target or targets in range. Each missile deals 63, 85, 102, 116, 129 physical damage, and an additional 10, 14, 17, 19, 22 bleeding damage every turn for 5 turns.

At talent level 5, you can conjure one additional missile.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Earthen Missiles

talents.info_text:
You root yourself into the earth, and transform your flesh into stone. While this spell is sustained, you may not move, and any forced movement will end the effect.

Your stone form and your affinity with the earth while the spell is active has the following effects:

  • Reduces the cooldown of Earthen Missiles, Pulverizing Auger, Earthquake, and Mudslide by 17%, 26%, 31%, 34%, 36%.
  • Grants 48%, 65%, 78%, 89%, 99% Fire Resistance, 29%, 40%, 48%, 55%, 61% Lightning Resistance, 11%, 15%, 18%, 21%, 23% Acid Resistance, and 11%, 22%, 33%, 44%, 55% Stun Resistance.

Resistances scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Body of Stone

talents.info_text:
Causes a violent earthquake that deals 49, 66, 79, 90, 100 physical damage in a radius of 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 each turn for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns, and potentially stuns any and all creatures it affects.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Earthquake

talents.info_text:
Concentrate on maintaining a Crystalline Focus, increasing all your physical damage by 2.8%, 5.4%, 7.5%, 9.2%, 11% and ignoring 17%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% physical resistance of your targets.

Also raises your physical and magical saves by 5, 11, 16, 22, 27.
talents.name: Crystalline Focus

description: Manipulate gems, and imbue their powers into other objects.
name: stone alchemy

talents.info_text:
Carve 40 to 80 alchemist gems out of a natural gemstone.

Alchemist gems are used for many other spells, and each gem type creates a different effect.
talents.name: Create Alchemist Gems

description: Alchemical control over stone and gems.
name: stone alchemy

talents.info_text:
Extract magical gems from metal weapons and armours. At this skill level you can work with:

  • Iron
  • Steel
  • Dwarven-steel
  • Stralite
  • Voratun
talents.name: Extract Gems

talents.info_text:
Imbue a body armour with a gem (up to tier 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), granting it additional powers.

You can only imbue items once, and it is permanent.
talents.name: Imbue Item

talents.info_text: Crush 5 alchemist gems into dust to mark impassable terrain next to you. You immediately enter it and appear on the other side of the obstacle, up to 14, 18, 21, 24, 26 grids away.
talents.name: Gem Portal

talents.info_text:
Touch your foe and turn it to stone for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns.

Stoned creatures are unable to act or regen life, and are very brittle.

If a stoned creature is hit by an attack that deals more than 30% of its life, it will shatter and be destroyed.

Stoned creatures are highly resistant to fire and lightning, and somewhat resistant to physical attacks.

At level 3 the touch will become a beam.

This spell may fail against creatures resistant to being stunned, that are specifically immune to stoning, or certain bosses.
talents.name: Stone Touch

description: Harness the power of the storm to incinerate your foes.
name: storm

talents.info_text:
Lightning emanates from you in a circular wave with radius 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, doing 42, 57, 68, 78, 86 to 126, 170, 204, 233, 259 lightning damage (84, 113, 136, 155, 172 average) and possibly dazing anyone affected (75% chance).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Nova

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of lightning, doing 60, 80, 96, 110, 122 to 179, 241, 289, 330, 367 damage (119, 161, 193, 220, 245 average) and dazing the target for 3 turns.

If the target resists the daze effect it is instead shocked, which halves stun/daze/pin resistance, for 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shock

talents.info_text:
Each time one of your lightning spells dazes a target, it has a 35%, 41%, 46%, 52%, 57% chance to creates a chain reaction that summons a mighty Hurricane that lasts for 10 turns around the target with a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3.

Each turn, the afflicted creature and all creatures around it will take 31, 42, 50, 58, 64 to 93, 126, 151, 173, 192 lightning damage (62, 84, 101, 115, 128 average).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hurricane

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with a Tempest, increasing all your lightning damage by 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%, 10% and ignoring 18%, 30%, 39%, 46%, 52% lightning resistance of your targets.

Your Lightning and Chain Lightning spells also gain a 9%, 19%, 29%, 39%, 49% chance to daze, and your Thunderstorm spell gains a 4%, 9%, 14%, 19%, 24% chance to daze.
talents.name: Tempest

description: The school of time manipulation.
name: temporal

talents.info_text: Project a bolt of time distortion, decreasing the target's global speed by 8%, 17%, 26%, 35%, 44% and all projectiles it fires by 51%, 67%, 80%, 90%, 90% for 7 turns.
talents.name: Congeal Time

talents.info_text:
This intricate spell instantly erects a time shield around the caster, preventing any incoming damage and sending it forward in time.

Once either the maximum damage (292, 394, 474, 541, 600) is absorbed, or the time runs out (6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns), the stored damage will return as a temporal restoration field over time (5 turns).

Each turn the restoration field is active, you get healed for 10% of the absorbed damage (Aegis Shielding talent affects the percentage).

The shield's max absorption will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Temporal Shield

talents.info_text:
Removes the target from the flow of time for 9, 11, 12, 14, 15 turns. In this state, the target can neither act nor be harmed.

Time does not pass at all for the target, no talents will cooldown, no resources will regen, and so forth.

The duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Time Prison

talents.info_text: Increases the caster's global speed by 6%, 16%, 21%, 23%, 25%.
talents.name: Essence of Speed

description: Combine the power of steamtech and arcane forces to destroy your foes with earth and water.
name: terrene technomancy

talents.info_text:
You build 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 micro spiderbot(s) from the earthly elements around you. Spiderbots are powered by an arcane cryogenic power unit directly linked to your own power.

Spiderbots will deal 19, 25, 30, 34, 38 terrene damage (physical and cold) each turn to their targets. The deep cold of the attack has 25% chance to freeze the feet of the target, pinning it to the ground for 5 turns.

If a target dies, the spiderbot will jump onto a new target in range 10 around you.

If there are multiple spiderbots on a single target and more free targets are in range they will dispatch on as many as possible.

If there are multiple spiderbots on a single target they attack as one, stacking their damage (with disminishing returns) and trying to freeze once.

You can maintain up to 3, 6, 8, 10, 11 spiderbots at once and each can last up to 9, 11, 13, 15, 16 turns, but spiderbots need to be in sight to be able to act.

The cooldown of this spell is affected by Body of Stone.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

You have currently 0 spiderbot(s) up.
talents.name: Micro Spiderbot

talents.info_text:
Each time a spiderbot expires it digs around, producing either a Glacial Vapour (36, 49, 58, 67, 74 cold damage and doing 30% more damage to wet targets) or Earthquake (36, 49, 58, 67, 74 physical damage and 25% chances to stun for 2 turns) of radius 1 that last for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Those special kinds of Glacial Vapour and Earthquake do not affect the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Cryogenic Digs

talents.info_text:
Command a random spiderbot to jump onto your target at ramming speed. The impact destroys the bot (possibly triggering Cryogenic Digs).

This creates a radius 3 explosion dealing 245, 331, 398, 454, 504 terrene damage to all creatures while also freezing them for 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns and rendering them wet for 5, 9, 11, 12, 13 turns.

The cooldown of this spell is affected by Body of Stone.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ramming Bot

talents.info_text:
You call back up to 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 spiderbots to you to create protective barrier for 11, 15, 18, 21, 24 turns.

Spiderbots have 52, 70, 84, 95, 105 life and they take damage in order, always fully absorbing the blow that destroyed them.

If Cryogenic Digs is active when a spiderbot is destroyed it jumps to the attacker and triggers the dig there.

The cooldown of this spell is affected by Body of Stone.
talents.name: Spiderbot Shield

description: Take on the defining aspects of an Undead Drake.
name: undead drake

talents.info_text:
You revel in death, devouring the souls of your victims. Whenever you inflict damage to a target, you deal an additional 11, 15, 19, 21, 24 darkness damage.

Additionally, you gain 1, 1, 1, 1, 2 souls whenever you score a kill.

The damage will scale with the highest of your spell or mind power and can only occur up to 15 times per turn.
talents.name: Raze

talents.info_text:
Release a cloud of deadly miasma over a targeted area, dealing 24, 32, 38, 44, 48 darkness damage to all units inside it with a 20% chance of inflicting a disease that will do blight damage and weaken either Constitution, Strength or Dexterity for 4, 5, 5, 6, 6 turns.

The damage will scale with the highest of your spell or mind power.
talents.name: Infectious Miasma

talents.info_text:
You surge with a life draining energy for 4, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns.

While the effect lasts, you heal yourself for 7%, 8%, 9%, 10%, 11% of all damage you deal.
talents.name: Vampiric Surge

talents.info_text:
You breathe a wave of deathly miasma in a cone of radius 5, 6, 7, 8, 9. Any target caught in the area will take 174, 225, 264, 296, 323 darkness damage over 4 turns and receive either a bane of confusion or a bane of blindness for 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Magic, and the critical chance is based on your Spell crit rate.
talents.name: Necrotic Breath

description: Harness the power of water to drown your foes.
name: water

talents.info_text:
Hurl ice shards at the targets in the selected area. Each shard travels slowly and does 126, 170, 204, 233, 259 ice damage, hitting all adjacent targets on impact with 25% chance to freeze them.

If the target resists being frozen, it instead get wet.

If the target is wet the damage increases by 30% and the ice freeze chance increases to 50%.

This spell will never hit the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ice Shards

talents.info_text:
Glacial fumes rise from the ground, doing 42, 57, 68, 78, 87 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 8 turns.

Creatures that are wet will take 30% more damage and have 15% chance to get frozen.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Glacial Vapour

talents.info_text:
A wall of water rushes out from the caster with an initial radius of 1, increasing by 1 per turn to a maximum radius of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5, doing 27, 37, 44, 51, 56 cold damage and 27, 37, 44, 51, 56 physical damage to all inside, as well as knocking back targets each turn.

The tidal wave lasts for 5, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns.

All creatures hit gain the wet effect, which reduces their stun/freeze immunity by half and interacts with other cold spells.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Tidal Wave

talents.info_text:
You absorb latent cold around you, turning into an ice elemental - a shivgoroth - for 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

While transformed, you do not need to breathe, gain access to the Ice Storm talent at level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, gain 68%, 88%, 100%, 100%, 100% resistance to cuts and stuns, gain 34%, 44%, 50%, 50%, 50% cold resistance, and all cold damage heals you for 118%, 138%, 150%, 150%, 150% of the damage done.

The power will increase with your Spellpower.

Ice storm:

Effective talent level: 0.0

Use mode: Activated

Mana cost: 25

Range: melee/personal

Cooldown: 20

Travel Speed: instantaneous

Usage Speed: Spell (100% of a turn)

Is: a spell

Description: A furious ice storm rages around the caster, doing 1.31, 2.69, 5.05, 7.45, 9.88 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 5, 6, 7, 8, 10 turns.

It has a 25% chance to freeze damaged targets.

If the target is wet the damage increases by 30% and the freeze chance increases to 50%.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shivgoroth Form

description: Harness the power of wildfire to burn your foes to ashes.
name: wildfire

talents.info_text:
A wave of fire emanates from you with a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, knocking back anything caught inside and setting them ablaze, doing 113, 152, 183, 209, 232 fire damage over 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blastwave

talents.info_text:
Your Flame, Flameshock, Fireflash and Blastwave spells leave a burning wake on the ground, burning all within for 33, 44, 53, 61, 68 fire damage for 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Burning Wake

talents.info_text:
When your Burning Wake talent is active, your Inferno and Burning Wake effects have a 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% chance, each turn, to remove a status effect (physical or magical) from the targets.

If the target is hostile, it will remove a beneficial effect.

If the target is friendly, it will remove a detrimental effect (but still burn).
talents.name: Cleansing Flames

talents.info_text: Surround yourself with Wildfire, increasing all your fire damage by 2.8%, 5.4%, 7.5%, 9.2%, 11%, ignoring 18%, 30%, 39%, 46%, 52% fire resistance of your targets and reducing self-inflicted fire damage by 15%, 30%, 46%, 61%, 77%.
talents.name: Wildfire
